service.unavailable: Service unavailable at this moment. Please try again later.
service.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.

content.unavailable: Could not load the content at this time. Please try again in a while.
content.itemDetailUnavailable: Could not find details for this {item}
content.loadMoreError: Failed to load more items. Please try again later.

contacts.accessRequestDesc: We require your contacts' access to suggest Shia people in your phonebook to invite to this app.

bookDetails.title: {title} â€” Find more free books like this on Bazm

tools.name: Tools
tools.salatAlarmDesc: Set alarms for Azaan as per your local times
tools.sehriAlarmDesc: Set Alarm for Sehri, or even get a wake-up call on your number before Sehri!
tools.tasbeehCounterDesc: Recite Duas, Quran and Tasbeeh on repeat mode easily with Audio Tasbeeh counter
tools.qnaDesc: Search and Ask questions or find answers to masle-masayel from your daily life on matters of Islam.

alarms.settingsTip: Change Location and preferences in Alarm settings. Click Settings icon to start.
alarms.minToImsak: {min} mins before Imsak | {hour} hour before Imsak
alarms.minToImsakDesc: Alarm rings {min} minutes before end of Sehri time | Alarm rings {min} hour before end of Sehri time
alarms.notRamadan: Looks like it's not Ramadan yet. Please come back during or just before the Ramadan to set the Alarms for Sehri

user.name: User | Account
user.shareUpdateToFeed: Also share this update to my feed
user.statusText_ph: Use _italics_ or *bold* formatting to decorate your status

unauthAccess.heading: Are you sure you're at the right place?
unauthAccess.desc:
It looks like you were trying to access a page for which you didn't have permission. If you were trying to access a page you've accessed previously, try to login; that should solve the problem.

Please feel free to contact us if the problem persists.

guest.heading: Why Login or Register?
guest.desc: With an account on our app, you can use a number of features. Get started by creating an account, if you don't have an account already. Or, just login!

engage.heading: Engage on app
engage.desc: Engage with other users, react to their posts or requests, comment your opinion, bookmark your items, and so much more!

fatiha.heading: Post Fatiha Request
fatiha.desc: Post request for Surah-e-Fatiha for the souls of your departed loved ones and get their souls blessed with prayers of all our users!

askQues.heading: Ask Questions
askQues.desc: Ask questions from Deen & Duniya on various topics to be answered by his eminence, Ayatullah Al-Sayyid Ali Al-Husseini Al-Sistani!

content.heading: preferred content
content.desc: Always see your preferred content and settings when you're logged in into your account. Also, get notified for all the interesting things!

personalized.heading: personalized sharing
personalized.desc: Set sharing content personalized with your signature so that your friends know when you share a message/post.

posts.title: Posts
posts.userNoPosts: When you change your picture/cover image, or when you request for surah-fatiha for your demised loved ones, these posts will appear here and in Home tab (of others too). Try adding a picture or cover image?

header.marhumeenNotAdded: {name} hasn't marhumeen added yet | You haven't added marhumeen yet
header.marhumeenAdded: {name} has added following marhumeen | You have added following marhumeen

createPost.heading: What's today about?
createPost.desc: Click here to share an update or use an option from below

dedication.placeholder: Who do you want to gift this to?
dedication.addPeopleToggle: Let others be a part of this sawab too!
dedication.searchInput: Invite momimeen from Bazm or your Contact list
dedication.minUsersHeader: Want to set minimum number that participants need to choose?

modal.postTime: When is it? | When do you want to start streaming?
modal.previewDes: This is how your post would appear in feed of other people. People can tap on the video to see it in full screen.

comments.name: Comments
comments.loadPrevious: Load previous comments | Load previous replies
comments.noComments: No comments on this post yet
comments.requestToLogin: Login or Signup to start discussion

title.addUpdate: Update loved one | Add loved one

addEditRel.heading: Add a loved-one who has passed on | Select a loved one from the list or add a loved-one who has passed on
addEditRel.subheader: Add details of your loved one | You can also include a message in your request

form.relation: Your relationship with her | Your relationship with him
form.demiseText: We're very sorry to hear about your loss. May Allah give you and your family the strength to bear this loss with patience and may Allah reward the demised soul with highest places in Jannah. Choosing this option enables you to ask momineen for Namaz-e-Wahshat for the demised soul.

addEditRel.addMsg_ph:
Example:
 Inna lillahi wa inna ilaihe raje'un. Please recite a surah-e-fatiha and 2-rak'at namaz-e-wahshat for my uncle, Syed Zeeshan Haider wald Syed Tauqeer Hasan Marhoom, who left us all crying behind to meet his creator.
addEditRel.infoEditRelative: You can edit details for {name} in your Account > Souls section

form.quesLabel_ph: Search for a question or ask your own
form.similarQues: These questions may already have the answer you're looking for.
form.askAnonInfo: Your name will not be sent to the Scholar when requesting an answer on your behalf, neither will it be display across our app with this question. But anonymous questions may not be answered quickly.
form.askSistaniInfo: You can ask a question to be answered by the office of his eminence, Ayatullah Al-Sayyid Ali Al-Husseini Al-Sistani. We will forward the question to their website (along with your profile information). Make sure you've read the Terms & Conditions properly.
form.sistaniOrgTncInfo: Consider following points from their website before you ask a question, because if you do not adhere to below points, you may not hear back from them, or may not receive any answers.

authPrompt.infoText: This feature requires you to login or register before you could use it. Click Login if you are already registered, or click Sign up to create your account.

cookieBanner.firstPara: We do not store any cookies on your {device} but third party apps used in our app might (such as, Google Analytics). We instead use permanent storage to store any important data, and in most cases, this is encrypted in storage and during tranfer.
cookieBanner.secondPara: By continuing to use this app, you hereby confirm that you don't have any issues with our choices. To find out more about our cookies and data use, see our Privacy Policy.

location.title: Change Location
location.autoDetectInfo: Enter your location or click the auto-detect icon to get your location.

reqAccess.subheading: We need permission to access your camera
reqAccess.subtext: Please allow the access by clicking the button below:

shareBtn.subtext: Click one of the options below to share this on respective app:

page1.infoText1: We need your mobile number to verify your identity. You may also get occasional updates.
page1.infoText2: Enter your number and click the button to get your confirmation code: | Enter your number and click a button to get your confirmation code:

page2.header: We've sent a 6-digit confirmation code to your number ({number})
